conversations.english: I've read your resume and know a lot of things about your qualifications for this position. One thing you didn't mention is why you left your last job? I know the company you worked for is a good company.
conversations.chinese: 我已读了你的简历，了解了很多关于你的情况。有一件事儿你没有涉及到，那就是你为什么辞去你最后的那份工作？我知道你工作的那家公司是一家挺好的公司。
conversations.reply_english: yes, it's a good company. But the management changed last month. We didn’t get along, so I quit.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。是一家不错的公司。但是，上个月，那家公司的管理层发生了变动。我和新的管理层不大合得来，所以我辞职了。

conversations.english: Dave, there's something I want to talk to you about.
conversations.chinese: 戴夫，我要跟你谈一件事。

conversations.english: I've been so tired recently. I've been trying, but I don't think I'm up to this job.
conversations.chinese: 最近很累，我一直都很努力，但是我觉得我不能胜任这个工作。
conversations.reply_english: You need to take a break, maybe a vacation.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你需要休息一下，或许需要休假。

title: 我上司不是个诚实的人

conversations.english: I don’t know what I’m going to do! It’s going to be impossible to make ends meet if I lose my job!
conversations.chinese: 我真不知道该怎么办！我要是丢了工作，一定会入不敷出的。
conversations.reply_english: Don’t worry. I don't think you’re going to lose your job over one mistake.
conversations.reply_chinese: 别担心，我觉得你不会因为只犯一次错就丢掉工作的。

conversations.reply_english: Let’s start with you. How was yours?

title: 为什么要辞掉这份工作

conversations.reply_english: Sure, what would you like to discuss?

conversations.english: Amelia, could you spare a few minutes?
conversations.chinese: 艾米利亚,你能腾出几分钟时间吗?
